meanings.definition: A person who refuses an offer or invitation.
meanings.sent1: The decliner politely declined the invitation to the party.
meanings.sent2: The decliner said no to the job offer.
meanings.sent3: The decliner turned down the chance to join the team with a smile.
meanings.sent4: She was a decliner of sweets, always saying no to dessert.
meanings.sent5: The decliner stood firm in their decision, rejecting the proposal.

meanings.definition: A device used to decline or incline.
meanings.sent1: The decliner on the treadmill helped adjust the slope for a tougher workout.
meanings.sent2: He used the decliner on his chair to lean back comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The decliner on the seat made it easy to relax and watch TV.
meanings.sent4: The decliner in the car allowed passengers to adjust their seating position.
meanings.sent5: With the push of a button, the decliner smoothly adjusted to the desired angle.
